output_data.clarification_question: What was the total face-to-face and/or total time spent with the patient for this established follow-up session? Time documentation is necessary to select the correct E/M service level (9921X) and the appropriate psychotherapy add-on duration (9083X). Also, please confirm the modality (In-person or Telehealth).
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes (This duration supports the common 90837 time bracket and combines well with E/M).

primary_code.description: Established patient office visit, Moderate Medical Decision Making (MDM)
primary_code.rationale: Placeholder: The session involves an established patient (Follow-up) and necessitates Moderate Medical Decision Making (MDM) due to the dose titration of Sertraline (a drug requiring careful management), assessment of a new significant symptom (passive suicidal ideation), and evaluation of treatment failure after 4 weeks.

addon_codes.rationale: Placeholder: Psychotherapy was provided concurrently with the E/M service, focusing on active risk assessment, exploring guilt and hopelessness, and developing immediate safety/treatment strategies. The specific code duration (90833, 90836, or 90838) requires total documented time.

output_data.medical_necessity: The patient presented with ongoing severe symptoms of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder* (F33.1), significant functional impairment (missed work), early morning awakening, and passive death ideation, requiring careful risk assessment, therapeutic intervention, and immediate titration of the SSRI medication.
